name: Jump Doll Super
summary:
A cute arcade jumping game. Play with your favourite doll in a surreal world. Unlock mysterious dolls by collecting coins.
No irritating ads! Offer extra characters and pets! Two characters to start with.
Have you ever owned a Matryoshka doll? When she quietly nested on your bookshelf, have you ever wondered what she’ll do if she could move?
Now, take your dolls on an adventure journey in a whimsical world.
Tap to jump, mind the time for your jumps, avoid the weirdos on the way, lead your doll to meet her loved one at the top of the world!
